TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: No Budget, Ive just been busy.
you know,rocket budget
I see Robug Labs was the basis for this, am I correct? Or the company that it was formed from?
Well the schedule system I hoped to keep went out the door, And Robug Labs was the beginning of Voyager Labs , When I launched the Voyager, Robug labs was over. Also no budget.

HI guys its me again anyway if u make spaceplanes, can u make me a plane that will be sizably big and will not lag my computer. stall speed 30 m/s for easy landings. and also can i have a new rocket that is like a skycrane design that will land on the mun and is stable. i would like it 1 manned please kthx bye.
I Said We're not taking orders anymore, Ive been busy in the Real world and wish I could play KSP all the time, But starting High School is rough, Even for me.
Whats the mod for the solar panel and the sattelite parts?
Probodyne, And I am oficially nicknaming the Plooto II The "Armstrong" It is the biggest step for me because I've never gotten a 3 person capsule into orbit. Plooto II test launch should be soon.
OK holiday weekend I will get the Plooto II and III Launched, and KTO 2-3, Also I will get some of the orders I can in the time limit done.

Hay are you stel getting orders? If so i need a space plane that is 0.13 safe that is all I need thank you

Ps. On a iPod ATM so will see the taps with pics on wene I can on a pc so good building to you
Is it okay to use a modified Plooto I launch vehicle for a craft? I made a similar looking booster and I'm afraid that I might be stealing a design. Thanks.
can you please make me a shuttle i got a space station but i need 1 shuttle thank you

I Said We're not taking orders anymore, Ive been busy in the Real world and wish I could play KSP all the time, But starting High School is rough, Even for me.

Hey Blindo's asking for ships, that's nice and all but he's busy! Read atleast 2 pages back before you post!

Giggle I dont care if anyone uses the Plooto I, I posted it so people could use it. After I get atleast most of the orders done I will begin to take orders, Like I said I wish I could play KSP all the time. I have to split time Between High School, Homework, And Most importantly (And possible the most deadly) Girlfriend. Holiday weekend I should be able to get some orders done, Im trusting Mnmm with the ones I cant get done.

I would be more than happy to help with your organization, Sbowyer. Seeing as how you only have 2 people I'd say you could also use the help. I have a fair amount of free time on my hands and am quite experienced in the rocketry department. Send me a message here on the forums and let me know on your decision. I check the forums pretty much every day at least once so I'll likely see it. But like I said, I would be more than happy to work under you in the organization for the betterment of us all. Plus it sounds fun. Hook me up!

Hi could I place an order please, I have most of the mods on here like MechJeb, Electrical Energy Plugin, ISA MapSat etc.

I have a satellite relay network set up using RemoteTech: Relay Network & Debris automation but my satellites look rather crappy, so would love some better looking ones and would love a probe with I can have orbit kerbin, mun and minmus that uses the ISAmapset and the monolith detector.

Oh and the space station as it looks fantastic

Thanks so much and really hope you can help me

EDIT: opps sorry I didn't see you stopped taking orders for now sorry

May I join the team? I am not great at rockets, but am fairly good at spaceplanes.

Hello. I'm NuclearWarfare, CEO of the new team of Aeroneers, Cyclone Aero-Labs. I need a satellite along with a Launch vehicle. The satellite doesn't need to be huge, just something I can send Intel around the globe to my planes. I know you do this for free, but I'm willing to build you a plane that you can have, but not share.
Is there anything specific you want for that satellite + launch vehicle? What sort of mods are okay to implement?
MMI pack (No kethane pack stuff please), just the Satellite and Payload pack if that would be fine. Thank you, Farce.

MMI pack (No kethane pack stuff please), just the Satellite and Payload pack if that would be fine. Thank you, Farce.

NuclearWarfare Farce13 is not with us But I Will Make You One.
